title: Thank You for a Great Year!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Mmmnh~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu. Honoka-chan looks so comfortable sleeping there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Sleeping under a kotatsu does feel really good~. Here, Ayumu-chan, some mikan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you.... Mmh, so sweet~. Fufu, eating mikan under a kotatsu is the best.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>....Hwah! I smell mikan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oooh, Honoka-chan, I get you! I wake up to the smell of mikan all the time~! Here’s one for you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Thanks for the food! Aaah~, mikan tastes so good~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hey, while we’re here, why don’t we take a look at the album Nozomi-san and the others put together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, the one they uploaded to the shared folder? I also want to look through that! It had pictures from a bunch of our gatherings.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>After the album, let’s watch some of our lives too! Let’s all stay up late today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
